MinBoneSize: Bones that are shorter than this value will be ignored for body creation
MinWeldSize: Bones that are smaller than this value will be merged together for body creation
GeomType: The geometry type that should be used when creating bodies
VertWeight: How vertices are mapped to bones when approximating them with bodies
bAutoOrientToBone: Whether to automatically orient the created bodies to their corresponding bones
bCreateConstraints: Whether to create constraints between adjacent created bodies
bWalkPastSmall: Whether to skip small bones entirely (rather than merge them with adjacent bones)
bBodyForAll: Forces creation of a body for each bone
bDisableCollisionsByDefault: Whether to disable collision of body with other bodies on creation
AngularConstraintMode: The type of angular constraint to create between bodies
HullCount: When creating multiple convex hulls, the maximum number that will be created.
MaxHullVerts: When creating convex hulls, the maximum verts that should be created
LevelSetResolution: When creating level sets, the grid resolution to use
LatticeResolution: When creating skinned level sets, the embedding grid resolution to use
